title: Update pre-login landing page tagline

requirements.text: Update the pre-login landing page (the unauthenticated EmptyState view) tagline text to exactly: “An AI-powered detective tool.”

quotes: yes, on the first page before the login

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is not authenticated and the EmptyState screen is shown, the tagline reads exactly “An AI-powered detective tool.”
The previous longer tagline (“An AI-powered detective tool to uncover hidden riddles from your clues”) no longer appears anywhere on the pre-login landing page.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Changing any authenticated (post-login) headings, copy, or functionality.
Changing the app name/logo or other branding beyond the specified tagline text.
